name: When the Universe throws you Rocks
name_original: When the Universe throws you Rocks
description:
A minimalist arcade shooter and my first real submission to a game jam :D

The theme of this KenneyJam was "Rotation".

Controls:

Rotate your Ship - Mouse Wheel, Left/Right Arrow, A/D

Shoot - press or hold Space

Credits can be found in game. I will update this later, but right now I'm way to nervous... Hope you enjoy :D
